text: Ara smarana karuna, yakhana amara apanara dike phiriye diyechilama jinadera ekati dalake [1], yara manoyogasahakare kura'ana patha sunachila. Atahpara yakhana tara tara kache upasthita hala, tara balala, â€˜cupa kare suna.â€™ Atahpara yakhana kura'ana patha samapta hala tara tadera sampradayera kache phire gela satarkakarirupe
